exceptions.tactic: intros g f x H1 H2.
intros g' f x H1 H2.
intros g' f' x H1 H2.
intros g' f' x' H1 H2.

original: intros g f x H1 H2. unfold is_lim in *. intros eps H3. specialize (H1 (fun y : R => f y - eps <= g y)). destruct x. - destruct (H1 lr). + apply Rbar_locally_witness with (x - eps). intros y H6. apply H. rewrite Rabs_right. apply Rplus_lt_reg_r with eps.
